title: Ielts speaking part2
content:
Small business

  1. Do you know many small businesses where you live?

  2. Do you prefer buying things in big companies or small businesses?

    • depends on the kinds of things that I need to buy

    • buy things in large quantities go for big shops because they offer a better deal in most cases

    • there’s a variety of choices unlike in small companies where choices are limited.

    • buy vegetables from small companies because the quality is way better than those sold by big companies.

  3. Have you ever worked in small businesses?

    • have no experience working in small businesses as I’m a student.
    • What I do everyday is juast studying
    • in this summer vacation work in a cafe or .. to earn some money for my trip.
    • stop asking parents for money

  4. Have you ever thought about starting your own business?

    • In primary I wanted to have my own bakery since I’m actually good at baking.
    • Difficult: finding the right location is essential for a bakery. purchase baking equipment, such as ovens, mixers and packaging supplies.
    • do your research, create a solid business plan, and be prepared to face challenges along the way.
